articles.title: Lightning hold off Canadiens’ rally, extend winning streak to four games
articles.description: TAMPA, Fla. — Nikita Kucherov scored twice, Gage Goncalves added two assists and had the deciding goal in the shootout as the Tampa Bay Lightning held off the Montreal Canadiens 5-4 on Sunday. articles.title: Oil Edges Higher With Ukraine Talks and China’s Pledge in Focus

articles.title: Call of the Wilde: Frantic Canadiens’ comeback in Tampa Bay ends in shootout loss
